translation.en: Where go you, my friend?
You're crawling in the wrong direction.
translation.es: Te arrastras en la dirección equivocada.

translation.en: That wind you feel is coming from England.
translation.es: El viento que sientes viene de Inglaterra.

translation.en: Scotland's that way.
My lords.
I'm most sorry for making you wait.
I know you've traveled far and from great travail.
translation.es: Sé que han tenido un largo y arduo viaje.

translation.en: I pray you will know that this time of civil unrest...
translation.es: Espero que entiendan que esta agitación social

translation.en: consumes me...
day and night.
I understand...
battle with the rebel Scots was hard fought.
translation.es: que la batalla contra los rebeldes escoceses fue dura.

translation.en: It was, my liege.
- We lost some 300 men. -
- Amen. - Amen.
Good Hotspur...
you led the charge. Were any prisoners of note taken?
Many.
- Are they in train? - No.
And why is that? Why have they not been brought to me directly?
translation.es: ¿Por qué? ¿Por qué no me los trajeron directamente?

translation.en: Why will you not pay cousin Mortimer's ransom?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no quiere pagar el rescate del primo Mortimer?

translation.en: You'll need to speak up, my boy.
I'm an old man.
My ears... are filled with hair.
translation.es: Tengo las orejas llenas de vello.

translation.en: Cousin Mortimer is held by the rebels of Wales.
translation.es: Los rebeldes de Gales tienen al primo Mortimer.

translation.en: Why do you refuse to pay his ransom?
translation.es: ¿Por qué se niega a pagar su rescate?

translation.en: I refuse to pay Mortimer's ransom because I refuse to believe him a prisoner.
translation.es: Porque me niego a considerarlo prisionero.

translation.en: I rather believe Mortimer a traitor.
He has joined the Welsh rebels.
translation.es: Se ha unido a los rebeldes galeses.

translation.en: He has betrayed England and is now an enemy of mine, and, therefore, of yours.
translation.es: Ha traicionado a Inglaterra. Ahora es mi enemigo y, por lo tanto, tuyo.

translation.en: You agree with my précis, young Hotspur?
translation.es: ¿Estás de acuerdo con lo que digo, Hotspur?

translation.en: - No. - My son--
I believe yours to be the ramblings of a crazy old demon.
translation.es: Creo que divaga como un demonio viejo y loco.

translation.en: Harry, please, stop this.
Oh, no, let him speak.
- I wish to hear him. - My liege--
translation.es: Quiero oírlo. - Señor... - Divaga como un anciano

translation.en: Yours are the ramblings of an old man so saturated with malice and mistrust
translation.es: - Señor... - Divaga como un anciano tan repleto de maldad y desconfianza

translation.en: that he no longer knows up from down,
translation.es: que ya no ve la realidad,

translation.en: can no longer see beyond the walls of his own monstrous schloss.
translation.es: ya no ve más allá de su monstruoso castillo.

translation.en: My family have served you.
We aided you in your ascension, and still we fight for you. Cousin Mortimer has fought for you.
translation.es: Lo ayudamos a ascender. Peleamos por usted. Mortimer también.

translation.en: And yet, now, whilst you slobber over that chicken's wing, he shivers in a western prison
translation.es: Y mientras usted se babea con ese pollo, él tiembla en una prisión del oeste,

translation.en: awaiting mutilation at the hands of Welsh witches.
translation.es: a la espera de ser mutilado por brujos galeses.

translation.en: My liege...
you must excuse my son.
He needs rest.
We come only... to advocate for your help in securing Mortimer's release.
translation.es: Vinimos a pedirle ayuda para la liberación de Mortimer.

translation.en: All that we've done for you we have done for the good of England.
translation.es: Lo que hicimos fue por el bien de Inglaterra.

translation.en: But our lands are now more riven with war than ever before.
translation.es: Pero ahora nuestra tierra está aún más escindida por la guerra.

translation.en: The Scots aren't finished. The Welsh have only just begun. And for what?
translation.es: Los escoceses no terminaron. Los galeses apenas comenzaron. ¿Para qué?

translation.en: Why do you think this might be, old man?
translation.es: ¿Por qué cree que pasa esto, anciano?

translation.en: Who do you imagine might be to blame for this?
Chickens can't fly.
But I've seen one...
eke enough wing flap to clear a fence.
translation.es: ...batir las alas y saltar una cerca.

translation.en: Then it's free.
But then so too are the foxes.
translation.es: Pero los zorros también son libres.

translation.en: You are right, young Percy. I owe you much.
translation.es: Tienes razón, joven Percy, te debo mucho.

translation.en: I owe your family still more.
translation.es: Y le debo todavía más a tu familia.

translation.en: But if the Scottish traitors you've taken prisoner are not brought to me as speedily as they might travel,
translation.es: Pero si no me traen de inmediato a los escoceses traidores que apresaron,

translation.en: I will hang you by your fucking neck.
Has this been heard, young Percy?
Your Majesty, please forgive us.
What a venomous boy.
He'll betray me now. I'm sure of it.
If only he were my son.
translation.es: Si tan solo fuera mi hijo.

translation.en: Hal?
- - What is it? Falstaff has injured hisself.
Yeah. See?
- How did you get inside? - The door was ajar.
It was not.
Yes, it was. It was ajar.
It was not ajar.
Well, how else might we gain entry?
Are you accusing me of having cut myself a secret key?
translation.es: ¿Me acusas de haber hecho una llave secreta?

translation.en: Yes.
Falstaff has injured hisself, Hal. Will you perform the small repairs?
Your Highness.
There's a fresh coin in this for you, you know.
translation.es: Te daré una moneda por esto.

translation.en: I don't want your coin.
I will require your undiminished loyalty from here till Megiddo.
translation.es: Solo exijo tu lealtad de aquí a Megido.

translation.en: You have that already.
You're a soft negotiator.
Hey! You're wasting good wine.
- I'm keeping it clean. - Give it.
Oh. That looks very hot.
Do it.
Prince Henry.
Who are you?
We come from the royal court. We wish to speak with you privately.
translation.es: Venimos de la corte real. Queremos hablar con usted en privado.

translation.en: For what?
Please, sire. Privately.
Oh, privately, in the middle of Eastcheap?
Should I make a quick up and down and request a mass covering of ears?
translation.es: ¿Doy una vuelta y les pido a todos que se tapen las orejas?

translation.en: Please, sire.
What is this?
Your father, His Majesty King--
translation.es: Su padre, su majestad el rey...

translation.en: Your father, His Majesty King Henry, is ill.
translation.es: Su padre, su majestad el rey Enrique, está enfermo.

translation.en: He requests your presence.
Hmm. I suggest you return to the palace directly
translation.es: Le sugiero que regrese al palacio

translation.en: and tell him his request was wholly ignored.
translation.es: y le diga que su pedido fue ignorado.

translation.en: I've been instructed to deliver the request with great urgency.
translation.es: Me pidieron que le entregara el mensaje con suma urgencia.

translation.en: You might tell him the urgency was also wholly ignored.
translation.es: Dígale que la urgencia también fue ignorada.

translation.en: My lady. My lady, it's time to leave.
- Why? -
The day has begun. See? - Out there. - It is well underway.
translation.es: Ya ha amanecido. ¿Ves? Ya es de día.

translation.en: - - You might miss it.
Get up now. It's important that you leave.
translation.es: Levántate. Es importante que te vayas.

translation.en: - Up. That's the spirit. -
Now, lift your arms.
Very good.
You must get that door fixed.
What is it?
Visit with your father.
translation.es: Ve a ver a tu padre.

translation.en: Go away.
If your father is indeed gravely ill enough to request your presence,
translation.es: Si tu padre está tan enfermo como para pedir verte,

translation.en: then you must visit with him.
It should be better to regret having done so than it would to have not.
translation.es: Es mejor arrepentirse de haberlo hecho que de no haberlo hecho.

translation.en: If your father is ill,
translation.es: Si tu padre está enfermo, sin importar lo que sientas,

translation.en: no matter your feelings for him, you must visit with him.
translation.es: Si tu padre está enfermo, sin importar lo que sientas, debes ir a verlo.

translation.en: But...
I say this not out of concern for our king's well- being,
translation.es: No lo digo por el bienestar de tu padre,

translation.en: but more for fear of the drunken soak to which you'll be likely to succumb
translation.es: sino por temor al borracho en el que te convertirás

translation.en: should you fail to heed his call and he were to die
translation.es: si no escuchas su pedido y él muere sin que hayan arreglado las cuentas.

translation.en: without you having squared your ledger.
translation.es: y él muere sin que hayan arreglado las cuentas.

translation.en: I fear that would be soak enough to put even me to shame.
translation.es: Creo que tus borracheras me humillarían incluso a mí.

translation.en: Do it.
If nothing else I ever suggest.
translation.es: Aunque solo me hagas caso en esto.

translation.en: While I see the strain your treasury is under,
translation.es: Si bien entiendo que su tesoro está sometido a presión,

translation.en: I cannot help but wonder if the canker of Lollardy
translation.es: me pregunto si la corrupción de los lolardos

translation.en: be at the root of this suggestion that the church be burdened with a tax
translation.es: es la raíz de la sugerencia de que la Iglesia pague impuestos

translation.en: to relieve problems that are not of the church's making.
translation.es: para aliviar problemas que no provoca la Iglesia.

translation.en: Your Majesty.
Henry, Prince of Wales.
My son.
Come in.
I feel my life nearing its natural end, and yet, still...
translation.es: Siento que mi vida llega a su fin...

translation.en: even I must appear of ruder health than you.
translation.es: ...pero creo que me veo más saludable que tú.

translation.en: The time has come for us to consider...
the issue of...
my succession.
You will not be king.
While you are my eldest son,
translation.es: Si bien eres mi hijo mayor,

translation.en: for reasons that are on display for all here to see,
translation.es: por motivos que están a la vista de todos,

translation.en: smell...
you will not inherit this crown.
Nor have I sought it.
That privilege and responsibility  will instead fall to your brother Thomas.
translation.es: El privilegio y la responsabilidad le corresponderán a tu hermano Tomás.

translation.en: He is soft, but he is eager.
He will lead my army against the newly treasonous Harry Percy.
translation.es: Liderará el ejército contra el nuevo traidor, Harry Percy.

translation.en: I will assume that this news comes as neither surprise nor disappointment.
translation.es: Supongo que las noticias no te sorprenden ni te decepcionan.

translation.en: But it is my duty as king,
translation.es: Pero es mi deber como rey

translation.en: and father...
to say it to you directly.
When do you fight?
I set off tomorrow.
We fight by week's end. You need not fight.
translation.es: - Pelearemos al final de la semana. - No tienes que pelear.

translation.en: These feuds need not be yours.
I have said...
what you were summonsed to hear.
translation.es: por el que te mandé a llamar.

translation.en: Leave us now.
- Your Highness. - Stop.
- Your Highness. - Stop.
Are your men ready for the day?
They are, sire.
Very good.
Tell me of your preparations.
My lord.
Why are you here?
I will not allow this havoc to transpire.
I've come to see it stopped.
This is my battle.
If I have my way, there will be no battle.
translation.es: Si yo pudiera decidir, no habría batalla.

translation.en: You. Come here.
- My lord. - You have no place here.
translation.es: - Tú. Ven aquí. - Señor. No tienes nada que hacer aquí.

translation.en: Go to the rebel camp, deliver the following message to Percy Hotspur.
translation.es: Ve con los rebeldes y dale este mensaje a Percy Hotspur.

translation.en: Tell him that Prince Henry challenges him to settle today's score man on man. He and I.
translation.es: Dile que el príncipe Enrique quiere enfrentarlo hoy, hombre a hombre.

translation.en: We will fight in our armies' places.
translation.es: Lucharemos en lugar de los ejércitos.

translation.en: Yes, my lord.
Who do you think you are?
I am nobody to you.
I will fight him.
And I will defeat him.
That you surely would, my son.
But it cannot be.
The prince speaks not for his father.
translation.es: El príncipe no representa al padre.

translation.en: You are eager to fight, my son.
And you will.
And we shall fight alongside you.
translation.es: Y nosotros pelearemos a tu lado.

translation.en: We will burn them.
We will burn Henry's reign to the ground.
translation.es: Arrasaremos con el reinado de Enrique.

translation.en: - You have no place here. - You do not know war, Thomas.
translation.es: - No deberías estar aquí. - No sabes nada de la guerra, Tomás.

translation.en: - I do know war. - You do not.
You've been recruited to our father's madness,
translation.es: La locura de nuestro padre te reclutó

translation.en: to wars that need not be fought.
translation.es: para guerras en las que no hay que luchar.

translation.en: These men are not our enemies.
translation.es: Estos hombres no son enemigos. Nuestro padre los convirtió en eso.

translation.en: - Our father has made them thus. - Why then are you here?
translation.es: Estos hombres no son enemigos. Nuestro padre los convirtió en eso. ¿Y qué haces aquí?

translation.en: You so disapprove of our cause, and yet, still, you find it necessary to upstage me.
translation.es: No estás de acuerdo con la causa, pero sientes la necesidad de opacarme.

translation.en: I do this not to steal your thunder, brother.  I do it to save your life.
translation.es: No lo hago para opacarte, hermano. Lo hago para salvarte la vida.

translation.en: Pardon me, my lords.
Our herald is returned from the rebel camp.
translation.es: El heraldo ha regresado del campamento rebelde.

translation.en: They have refused Prince Henry's offer.
translation.es: Han rechazado la oferta del príncipe Enrique.

translation.en: They want battle.
Where is Henry?
I come to fight him in our armies' stead.
His offer was refused.
The offer has been reconsidered.
I said...  no!
Why is the little dog barking?
Where be the big dog?
It will be done.
And here I am with the whoring fool.
This fight need not be had, Percy.
My father will soon be dead. Your grievances will die with him.
translation.es: Mi padre pronto morirá. Tus reclamos morirán con él.

translation.en: Don't be afraid of our small contest, young Hal.
translation.es: No temas a nuestra disputa, joven Hal.

translation.en: I promise to finish it quickly.
Your father...
is plague to England.
Come for me, big dog!
Someday this will be your head, dropped at the feet of a man
translation.es: Algún día, esta será tu cabeza, a los pies de un hombre que debería haber sido tu hermano.

translation.en: who might otherwise have been your brother.
translation.es: a los pies de un hombre que debería haber sido tu hermano.

translation.en: Come with me now, Thomas, please. Walk away from this field.
translation.es: Ven conmigo, Tomás, por favor. Vete de este campo.

translation.en: After you have stolen its prized scalp?
translation.es: ¿Después de que tú robaras este trofeo?

translation.en: This is what will be spoken of tomorrow.
This field was mine.
It was to mark my dominion.
Instead now...
it marks only this head.
This fucking head!
Move.
- John. -
Go away.
You might want to see to your otherwise well- appointed friend.
translation.es: Querrás encargarte de tu supuesto amigo.

translation.en: He seems to have taken a pitiful turn.
translation.es: Parece que tomó una mala decisión.

translation.en: Hal's up- chucked again.
Hello, friend.
Many times have I seen men in your state.
translation.es: He visto a muchos hombres en tu estado.

translation.en: I've been in it many times over myself.
translation.es: Yo he estado así muchas veces.

translation.en: For all our rejoice of... courage and valor,
translation.es: A pesar del regocijo del coraje y valor...

translation.en: nothing stains the soul more indelibly than killing.
translation.es: ...nada mancha más el alma que matar.

translation.en: Never have I felt so vile... than standing victorious on a battlefield.
translation.es: Nunca me he sentido más vil que victorioso en un campo de batalla.

translation.en: The thrill of victory fades quickly.
translation.es: La emoción de la victoria se desvanece rápido.

translation.en: What lingers long after... is always ugly.
translation.es: Lo que queda después es desagradable.

translation.en: Never again, I say.
Stop talking, old man, please.
translation.es: Deja de hablar, anciano, por favor.

translation.en: Please stop talking.
I will never stop talking, Hal.
Never.
Never ever.
Out.
My lord.
What business?
It is a matter of great urgency.
translation.es: Es un asunto de suma urgencia.

translation.en: Mm. You should hurry along then.
Please, my lord.
It is your father.
He's dying.
Hmm, that hook has lost its worm.
Wait outside.
No doubt...
your father has brought...
much trouble to this kingdom,
and I fear the chaos that might erupt in his absence.
translation.es: Temo por el caos que podría surgir en su ausencia.

translation.en: England needs a king, and I suspect those sentiments of yours
translation.es: Inglaterra necesita un rey, y creo que los sentimientos

translation.en: that had you resile from him
translation.es: que te han alejado de él

translation.en: are precisely those the governance of this land needs.
translation.es: son precisamente los que se necesitan para gobernar esta tierra.

translation.en: You must be king.
Why do you say this to me?
Speak to Thomas.
Is he not to be your new king?
translation.es: ¿Acaso no es él el futuro rey?

translation.en: I'm afraid that is not possible.
translation.es: Me temo que eso no será posible.

translation.en: Your brother was killed in Wales.
translation.es: Tu hermano fue asesinado en Gales.

translation.en: After you defeated Percy Hotspur,
translation.es: Después de que venciste a Percy Hotspur...

translation.en: young Thomas pressed on to the western fields.
translation.es: ...Tomás emprendió la marcha hacia el oeste.

translation.en: This is where he met his end.
It is said he gave valiant account of himself.
Where is he?!
Where is the monster?!
Where is the monster?
Move. Leave him. The King needs rest.
translation.es: - A un lado. Déjenlo. - El rey necesita descansar.

translation.en: - Soon he will have it. - He's dying.
Leave.
You feel this cold?
- Wretch. -
You must be king, Hal.
Please.
You must be king, Hal.
I know not what I have done.
You know not what will become of you.
translation.es: No saben lo que les depara.

translation.en: So, I offer you this...
The most blessed reprieve,
the most dreadful misery.
You shall suffer the indignity of serving me,
translation.es: Sufrirán la humillación de servirme a mí...

translation.en: the wayward son you so revile.
But know now you will be watched over by an altogether different king.
translation.es: Pero ahora serán vigilados por un rey completamente distinto.

translation.en: What is this?
Who are you?
I am I.
Who are you?
What is your purpose here?
I think you just woke me up from it, didn't you?
Rise from that bed at once.
translation.es: Levántese de la cama de inmediato.

translation.en: Who are you?
Where is Hal?
These lodgings and their contents are the property of the King of England.
translation.es: Este lugar y todo su contenido es propiedad del rey de Inglaterra.

translation.en: You are trespassing and I order you to vacate at once.
translation.es: No tiene derecho a estar aquí, y le ordeno que se retire ya mismo.

translation.en: What King of England?
All hail King Henry.
King Henry! King Henry! King Henry!
King Wenceslaus of Bohemia
presents this gift to King Henry of England.
translation.es: le entrega este obsequio al rey Enrique de Inglaterra.

translation.en: To long and good health.
translation.es: Le desea larga y buena salud.

translation.en: Beautiful.
I'm sure you all know...
my young sister Philippa has joined us here today.
translation.es: que mi hermana menor, Felipa, nos acompaña hoy.

translation.en: Queen of Denmark.
I'm thankful she and her husband,
translation.es: Les agradezco a ella y a su esposo,

translation.en: the good King Eric, have traveled all this way.
translation.es: el buen rey Eric, que hayan viajado hasta aquí.

translation.en: I wish for you take this vase, my dear.
Let its beauty stand for your beauty, which stands in turn for England's beauty.
translation.es: Que su belleza simbolice tu belleza, que representa la belleza de Inglaterra.

translation.en: I thank you, my lord.
His Serenity, the doge of the Republic of Venice,
translation.es: Su serenidad, el dux de la república de Venecia,

translation.en: present this gift in your honor, my liege.
translation.es: le hace entrega de este obsequio, señor.

translation.en: - It says it is a bird from Constantinople. - A bird?
translation.es: Dice que es un ave de Constantinopla. ¿Un ave? Me imagino que estará muerta.

translation.en: A dead one, I should suppose.
translation.es: ¿Un ave? Me imagino que estará muerta.

translation.en: If I may, my liege.
Unnatural mechanics from the edge of Christendom.
A wonder.
This belongs to my cousin, Cambridge.
translation.es: Esto será para mi primo, Cambridge.

translation.en: Of all at this table, none have I known longer than I have you.
translation.es: De todos aquí, es al que conozco hace más tiempo.

translation.en: Indeed I have known you longer than I have my own young sister.
translation.es: Te conozco hace más tiempo que a mi hermana menor.

translation.en: We were raised together. You're like an older brother to me.
translation.es: Crecimos juntos. Eres como mi hermano mayor.

translation.en: So, I think it only fitting that you should have this magical bird.
translation.es: Me parece justo obsequiarte esta ave mágica.

translation.en: Let's hope its magic isn't black and unholy.
translation.es: Esperemos que no sea magia negra y profana.

translation.en: From the Dauphin, son of His Majesty, Charles, King of France.
translation.es: De parte del delfín, hijo de su majestad, el rey Carlos de Francia.

translation.en: A ball.
There is no accompanying message from the Dauphin?
No, my liege.
I shall keep this gift.
This one is sent only for me.
For the boy I once was.
translation.es: Para el niño que alguna vez fui.

translation.en: The ball is an insult to you and to your kingdom.
translation.es: La pelota es un insulto a ti y a tu reino.

translation.en: You must respond.
Remember where, as prince, I whiled and how I spent my days?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas cómo pasaba el tiempo cuando era príncipe?

translation.en: You spent them in considered privation.
Drinking, clowning.
So, is there not some truth in this jest?
translation.es: ¿Acaso esta broma no tiene algo de verdad?

translation.en: If the Dauphin wants from me a paroxysm, why give it him?
translation.es: Si el delfín espera un paroxismo de mí, ¿por qué dárselo?

translation.en: It would not be a show of foul temper
translation.es: No sería grosero de tu parte

translation.en: for you to respond forcefully to an insult such as that.
translation.es: responder enfáticamente a un insulto como este.

translation.en: It would be a show of strength.
I appreciate your umbrage, William,
but my strength does not lie in me flapping up and down at the slightest barb like...
translation.es: pero mi fortaleza no se demuestra al alterarme con cualquier pulla,

translation.en: - some unholy mechanical bird. - Mm.
Make sense of this. This is what is pressing.
translation.es: Piensa en esto. Esto es lo que apremia.

translation.en: Civil strife has consumed us.
translation.es: La lucha civil nos ha consumido.

translation.en: The war drains the purse like little else.
translation.es: La guerra nos vacía como nada más.

translation.en: This strife must end.
And it will end... by conciliation.
translation.es: Y terminará con un acto de conciliación.

translation.en: We shall pardon our adversaries.
And we shall pay Mortimer's ransom and have him returned from Wales.
translation.es: Pagaremos el rescate de Mortimer, y así regresará de Gales.

translation.en: I will write these pardons in mine own hand.
translation.es: Escribiré estos indultos de puño y letra.

translation.en: I want it known these sentiments are so personal to me.
translation.es: Quiero que sepan que es un tema personal.

translation.en: We shall let these men know they were my father's enemies, not mine.
translation.es: Quiero que sepan que ellos eran enemigos de mi padre, no míos.

translation.en: Certainly, my liege.
How does this strategy greet you?
Great reforms are best enacted with regime change.
translation.es: Las grandes reformas suceden con un cambio de régimen.

translation.en: If this is how you wish to proceed,
translation.es: Si es lo que desea hacer,

translation.en: then, yes, my liege,
now is the time to do it.
Did you reconcile with our father before his death?
translation.es: ¿Te reconciliaste con nuestro padre antes de su muerte?

translation.en: There was no reconciliation to be had.
He did untold harm to this kingdom.
translation.es: Le provocó un daño incalculable al reino.

translation.en: His death will bring calm with it.
I ask not after the kingdom.
What of you?
I want an end to this unrest.
Look around that table last night.
Look at the faces of the men seated at it.
translation.es: Vi los rostros de los hombres presentes.

translation.en: I can feel this calm of which you speak.
translation.es: Siento la calma de la que hablas.

translation.en: I do believe they wish you well.
translation.es: Creo que desean lo mejor para ti.

translation.en: But I also see that they have their own kingdoms behind their eyes.
translation.es: Pero también creo que, tras sus miradas, tienen sus propios reinos.

translation.en: Do you understand what I say?
I've been away too many years and I'm now to return to Denmark.
translation.es: Me fui hace muchos años y ahora debo regresar a Dinamarca.

translation.en: But I have, in my time in that court, been privy to its commissions.
translation.es: Pero cuando estaba en la corte, sabía de sus funciones.

translation.en: I have seen there, again and again, that no one ever speaks true, wholly true.
translation.es: Vi una y otra vez que nadie es completamente sincero.

translation.en: Choose your steps wisely, dear brother.
I speak to Charles of France's claim
translation.es: Hablo del pedido de Carlos de Francia

translation.en: to be the legitimate sovereign ruler of said lands.
translation.es: de ser el legítimo gobernante de dichas tierras.

translation.en: It is said that the Salic law would have no succession
translation.es: Se dice que la ley sálica no permite la sucesión

translation.en: if the French crown fall to a woman.
translation.es: de la corona francesa a una mujer.

translation.en: Meaning, no rule left in the lineage of the female
translation.es: Significa que, por ley, no podrán ser sucesores

translation.en: shall, by rights, pass to her issue.
translation.es: Significa que, por ley, no podrán ser sucesores sus hijos.

translation.en: Now, the law Salic, which is of Frankish land
translation.es: La ley sálica es de tierras francas

translation.en: and tethered to said lands is not--
not therefore legally bound or adherent at all, in fact,
translation.es: pero no rige en absoluto en las tierras de Francia,

translation.en: to the lands of France, but to those of Francia,
translation.es: pero no rige en absoluto en las tierras de Francia, sino en las tierras del reino Franco, entre los ríos Elba y Saale.

translation.en: which, as you know, lies between the rivers of Elbe and Saale.
translation.es: sino en las tierras del reino Franco, entre los ríos Elba y Saale.

translation.en: I claim here, with proof, that hence it follows that the law Salic,
translation.es: Vengo a declarar, con pruebas, que la ley sálica

translation.en: which has seen French sovereignty stolen as such from a true lineage--
translation.es: le ha robado a Francia la verdadera soberanía tres veces.

translation.en: Thrice, as I can illuminate, the French have cited the law Salic
translation.es: le ha robado a Francia la verdadera soberanía tres veces. Según recuerdo, los franceses han citado la ley sálica para evitar una sucesión...

translation.en: - as reason to bar a female succession-- - With reverence.
translation.es: Según recuerdo, los franceses han citado la ley sálica para evitar una sucesión... Su reverencia.

translation.en: Yes, my liege?
I'm finding this story impossible to follow.
translation.es: Me resulta imposible seguir esta historia.

translation.en: My liege, I question the so- called French king's claim
translation.es: Señor, cuestiono el derecho del supuesto rey francés

translation.en: to the throne upon which he sits.
Is that so?
What confuses me now is why you are telling me this story.
translation.es: Lo que me confunde es por qué me cuenta esta historia.

translation.en: My liege, I simply aim to bolster your claim to France
translation.es: Señor, simplemente quiero apoyar su derecho al trono de Francia,

translation.en: should the need to meet her with force soon arise.
translation.es: en caso de que pronto surgiera tal necesidad.

translation.en: And you believe that need will indeed soon arise?
translation.es: ¿Y usted cree que esa necesidad pronto surgirá?

translation.en: My liege...
by way of preparedness,
- I believe it always wise-- - Preparedness?
If we are to war with France, it will not come as a consequence of an old and impenetrable madrigal.
translation.es: Si fuéramos a la guerra con Francia, no sería por un madrigal incomprensible.

translation.en: France was your father's long- held ambition.
translation.es: Francia era el sueño de su padre.

translation.en: Had he not been bogged in civil feud,
translation.es: De no haberse enredado en una pelea civil,

translation.en: he would most surely have taken the fight to her.
translation.es: sin duda habría luchado por conquistar Francia.

translation.en: And then... on to Jerusalem.
Jerusalem?
We're all the way to the Holy Land, are we?
translation.es: La idea es llegar a Tierra Santa, ¿no?

translation.en: And presumably to sack the rest of Christendom along the way.
translation.es: Y seguramente saquear todo el mundo cristiano en el camino.

translation.en: I am not my father, archbishop.
translation.es: Yo no soy mi padre, arzobispo.

translation.en: I would have thought this to be clear by now.
translation.es: Creí que eso ya estaría claro.

translation.en: We must forgive our archbishop.
He is a far...
far from gifted orator.
Which is strange, given I would have thought gifted oratory to be a requirement of the position.
translation.es: Lo cual es extraño, ya que me imaginaba que era un requisito para su trabajo.

translation.en: Why is the archbishop speaking to me of war with France?
translation.es: ¿Por qué el arzobispo me habla de una guerra con Francia?

translation.en: What we are witnessing is a stirring,
of which we must be wary.
I applaud... your restraint.
After so many years of strife,
translation.es: Después de tantos años de conflicto...

translation.en: you are proving to be more than your father's son.
translation.es: ...demuestras ser más que el hijo de tu padre.

translation.en: You wish to be a king for the people.
translation.es: Deseas ser un rey para el pueblo.

translation.en: Now, we must ensure to that end, however,
translation.es: Debemos asegurarnos de que, para lograrlo,

translation.en: you do not remain oblivious to the mood of the people.
translation.es: no seas indiferente al ánimo del pueblo.

translation.en: And what mood is this?
That France is taunting us.
translation.es: Francia se está burlando de nosotros.

translation.en: Do you share this mood?
this mood is a fantasy.
But that does not mean it is not felt true.
translation.es: Pero no significa que no se sienta real.

translation.en: - Where are you going? - Disgusting.
- No, we can't be going to Hooper's. - Yes, we can.
translation.es: No podemos ir con Hooper. Sí podemos.

translation.en: - No, she won't have you. - Yes, she will.
translation.es: - No te recibirá. - Sí me recibirá.

translation.en: - Nope! - Yes.  - No. - Yes!
- You're not welcome here. -
Unless you've come to pay me what you owe me.
translation.es: A menos que vengas a pagar tus deudas.

translation.en: I have paid you.
You've paid me a snatch of what you owe.
translation.es: Me pagaste una mínima parte de que lo que me debes.

translation.en: And I presume, too, from the proceeds of thieving.
translation.es: Y supongo que me pagaste con lo que has robado.

translation.en: Lies.
By all account, you be not specially good at thieving neither.
translation.es: Según se dice, tampoco eres bueno para robar.

translation.en: Lies.
How dare you address me so?
Why would you be so churlish
translation.es: ¿Por qué eres tan grosera con el hombre

translation.en: with the very man most likely to lift you from your stinking rat hole?
translation.es: ¿Por qué eres tan grosera con el hombre que podría ayudarte a salir de este nido de ratas apestoso?

translation.en: Oh, maybe you've forgot.
My associations now stretch to the highest reaches of the realm.
translation.es: Mis amistades llegan a las más altas esferas del reino.

translation.en: Your insolence might as well be directed to the king himself.
translation.es: Para el caso, tu insolencia podría estar dirigida al rey.

translation.en: Ponder that now.
Are you speaking of Hal?
Where is he?
- - Where is Hal?
Where's our king?
He be gone weeks and weeks now. Where is he?
translation.es: Hace semanas que no lo vemos. ¿Dónde está?

translation.en: - - I would say... - - you be the one that's been forgot.
translation.es: Yo diría que él se ha olvidado de ti.

translation.en: - Oh. - I would say that your dalliance
translation.es: Yo diría que él se ha olvidado de ti. Yo diría que tu flirteo con las altas esferas del reino

translation.en: with the upper reaches of the realm
translation.es: Yo diría que tu flirteo con las altas esferas del reino

translation.en: was short- lived in and around his stinking sick bucket.
translation.es: duró poco y estuvo confinado a su bacinilla.

translation.en: Seems you were little more than passing keeper of a prince's puke.
translation.es: Apenas fuiste el guardián transitorio del vómito del rey.

translation.en: - - Shut up.
translation.es: Apenas fuiste el guardián transitorio del vómito del rey. Cállate.

translation.en: Ponder that now.
Nell, Sir John is down on his luck.
translation.es: Nell, John no pasa por un buen momento.

translation.en: I am not.
You find someone to pay your way here.
translation.es: Búscate a alguien que pague por ti.

translation.en: I'll not be paying it for you.
Head.
Head.
Who are you?
He seeks asylum in return for his tale.
translation.es: Busca asilo a cambio de su información.

translation.en: I do not doubt this can be arranged.
Can it or not? You are the King, no?
translation.es: ¿Se puede o no? Usted es el rey, ¿no?

translation.en: It can be arranged.
I have been sent by the King of France to assassinate you.
translation.es: El rey de Francia me envió a asesinarlo.

translation.en: Charles himself sent you?
You know this to be certain?
The order's origin I know, yes. From the King.
translation.es: Conozco el origen de la orden. El rey.

translation.en: What was the order?
That I should kill the King of England.
How?
There are many ways to kill a man.
It is my talent... killing men who do not expect to be killed.
translation.es: Mi talento es matar a hombres que no esperan ser asesinados.

translation.en: At such a time as I endeavor to foster a fresh and peaceful air
translation.es: En este momento, me esfuerzo por darle un aire renovado y pacífico a este reino.

translation.en: for this kingdom to breathe,
translation.es: por darle un aire renovado y pacífico a este reino.

translation.en: it is not in my interest to stir hostility with another.
translation.es: Por lo tanto, no me interesa provocar enemistad con otro.

translation.en: This is an act of war.
We share your longing for peace, my liege,
translation.es: Compartimos su deseo de paz, señor,

translation.en: but to ignore such an audacious act of aggression
translation.es: pero ignorar un acto de agresión tan atrevido

translation.en: will be seen as weakness.
This is no game ball. This is an assassin.
translation.es: No es una pelota. Es un asesino.

translation.en: Would you consider me weak, Chief Justice?
No, I speak more of the kingdom.
translation.es: No, hablo más bien del reino.

translation.en: What the kingdom sees. What the kingdom sees. Mm.
translation.es: - Lo que el reino ve. - Lo que el reino ve.

translation.en: How, pray, might the kingdom see the weasel beneath our feet?
translation.es: ¿Cómo podría ver el reino al traidor bajo nuestros pies?

translation.en: If France's animus towards you runs deep enough for them to send an assassin,
translation.es: Si el odio de Francia es tan profundo como para enviar a un asesino...

translation.en: it will be felt in the street, ours and theirs.
translation.es: ...se sentirá en las calles, suyas y nuestras.

translation.en: It will be known.
We share your concerns. But peace today needs more than harmony.
translation.es: Entendemos tu preocupación, pero la paz necesita más que armonía.

translation.en: It needs strength...
and confidence.
These are qualities that can originate only in you,
translation.es: Esas cualidades solo pueden surgir de ti...

translation.en: the king.
Our king.
Take down these words...
addressed to King Charles of France.
translation.es: ...y envíalas al rey Carlos de Francia.

translation.en: This assassin you send
can be taken as nothing other than an infant act of war.
translation.es: solo puede ser considerado una declaración de guerra.

translation.en: If this be your intention,
I say you let it be known plainly
translation.es: le pido que lo diga con claridad

translation.en: and that you desist from this timorous slither in which you presently engage.
translation.es: y desista de esta actitud temerosa con la que actúa.

translation.en: If it be war you seek,
translation.es: Si es una guerra lo que busca,

translation.en: send the full weight of your army.
translation.es: envíe todo el peso de su ejército.

translation.en: For a lone, cowardly assassin
will not topple this King Henry the Fifth of England you so underestimate.
translation.es: no derrocará al rey Enrique V de Inglaterra al que tanto subestima.

translation.en: Fill this with gunstones and send it back to France.
translation.es: Llenen esto de bolaños y envíenlo a Francia.

translation.en: - Who is it? - A Frenchman, sire.
He says he wishes to speak with you privately.
translation.es: Quiere hablar en privado con usted.

translation.en: About what?
He wouldn't say, sire.
I asked of him, he wouldn't say.
My king has sent me to seek out men he feels he can trust.
translation.es: Mi rey me ha enviado por hombres en los que pueda confiar.

translation.en: He believes there is discreet discussion to be had.
What discussion?
He believes there is discussion to be had about your new king of England.
translation.es: Quiere conversar de su nuevo rey de Inglaterra.

translation.en: Only myself and Lord Grey were met.
translation.es: Solo nos hablaron a mí y a lord Grey.

translation.en: We knew not where to turn about what was spoken to us.
translation.es: No sabíamos a quién comentarle lo que nos dijeron.

translation.en: We're all of us aware there's a standing problem.
translation.es: Todos sabemos que hay un problema.

translation.en: Our king is of low repute.
The French king... teaches you this?
Is he not thankful
for our young Henry's light reaction to his provocation?
translation.es: con la moderada respuesta de Enrique a su provocación?

translation.en: The assassin he swears he knows not of.
translation.es: Él jura no conocer a ese asesino.

translation.en: 'Tis a charge he denies.
His plot came to naught.
Of course he would wish to wipe his hands of it.
Whatever the root,
they have expressed grave concern
regarding our king's mental fortitude.
translation.es: por la salud mental de nuestro rey.

translation.en: This envoy is to be trusted, is he not, Cambridge?
translation.es: Este enviado es de confianza, ¿no, Cambridge?

translation.en: I believe so.
Charles wishes to dethrone our king.
translation.es: Carlos quiere destronar a nuestro rey.

translation.en: The issue is not France.
This is but a reminder to us of a more general lunacy.
translation.es: Esto es un recordatorio de una demencia más general.

translation.en: A boy who but weeks ago was a drunken boor
translation.es: Un muchacho que hasta hace poco era un bruto borracho

translation.en: from the sewers of Eastcheap now wears England's crown.
translation.es: de las alcantarillas de Eastcheap lleva la corona de Inglaterra.

translation.en: - Hmm. - What shall become of us?
What shall become of us when civil misdeeds are forgiven as if they were but indiscretions?
translation.es: ¿Qué será de nosotros cuando las fechorías sean consideradas solo deslices?

translation.en: - When traitors-- - Yes, yes, Lord Grey, your--
translation.es: - Cuando los traidores... - Sí, lord Grey.

translation.en: Your concerns are current.
And they are numerous.
Something must be done.
Something will be done.
Give me quiet.
Thus is a king's burden.
translation.es: Tal es la carga de un rey.

translation.en: A king must make decisions
lesser men are...
neither willing nor able to make.
translation.es: ...no pueden ni están dispuestos a tomar.

translation.en: A king is indeed presented with quandaries
translation.es: Un rey se enfrenta a dilemas

translation.en: lesser men might never encounter in the course of their whole lives.
translation.es: que los hombres inferiores jamás ven en sus vidas.

translation.en: I wish it were not so.
But problems...
And this is my experience.
Problems that are left unattended...
translation.es: los problemas que no se resuelven...

translation.en: have a habit of becoming crises.
You have a chance here to unite the land, Hal.
translation.es: Tienes la oportunidad de unir la tierra, Hal.

translation.en: Truly.
You have refreshed its mood with promise.
translation.es: Has renovado el ánimo con promesas.

translation.en: But promise must be fulfilled.
translation.es: Pero las promesas hay que cumplirlas.

translation.en: Promise can never be an end in itself.
translation.es: Una promesa nunca es un fin.

translation.en: As of this day, we're at war with France.
translation.es: A partir de hoy, estamos en guerra con Francia.

translation.en: Twice I have given her the benefit of my doubt.
translation.es: Les di dos veces el beneficio de la duda.

translation.en: This third affront will not be left unchecked.
translation.es: Esta tercera ofensa no será desestimada.

translation.en: And so, in order to flush these French rats from their nests,
translation.es: Para hacer salir a las ratas francesas de sus escondites...

translation.en: I will have it communicated to them that we are now at war.
translation.es: ...haré que les comuniquen que estamos en guerra.

translation.en: My Lord Grey.
I would ask you to deliver this message to France, given your...
translation.es: Les pediría que entregaran el mensaje a Francia...

translation.en: familiarity with its recipient.
But I believe in the morning you be otherwise engaged.
translation.es: Pero estarán ocupados en la mañana.

translation.en: Pray how, my liege?
Tomorrow you will have your heads cut off.
I have chosen to send you as an advance party to Hell
translation.es: Decidí enviarlos por adelantado al infierno

translation.en: for the considerable French number that will soon be needing to find space there.
translation.es: por la gran cantidad de franceses que pronto buscarán lugar ahí.

translation.en: You were once my friend.
I am your friend...
cousin.
All leave.
Now.
You.
Stay.
You...
leave.
This is my place.
The hostess can stay.
I will not jump to your attention.
translation.es: No me humillaré por tu atención.

translation.en: And surely not to retread vile ground
translation.es: Mucho menos volveré a andar por suelos viles

translation.en: I vowed never to walk again.
translation.es: a los que juré no volver.

translation.en: I acknowledge my neglect of you, John.
A new chapter of my life has begun before the last could be properly closed.
translation.es: Comencé un nuevo capítulo en mi vida antes de cerrar el anterior.

translation.en: These concerns are mine and mine alone.
But the fact that this here be the first occasion
translation.es: Pero el hecho de poder mencionárselos

translation.en: I've had to sound them aloud to anyone other than myself speaks volumes.
translation.es: a alguien más que a mí mismo es de suma importancia.

translation.en: It speaks to the loneliness of the position in which I find myself.
translation.es: Tiene que ver con la soledad del cargo que ocupo.

translation.en: To steer our present course, I've been forced to rely upon the counsel of men
translation.es: Debido a la situación, me veo obligado a escuchar

translation.en: whose loyalty I question every waking moment.
translation.es: a hombres cuya lealtad cuestiono todo el tiempo.

translation.en: Every waking moment.
I need men around me I can trust.
translation.es: Necesito a hombres en quienes pueda confiar.

translation.en: I'm here because you are my friend.
A king has no friends.
A king has only...
followers...
and foe.
I'm sorry my occasion to visit...
carries with it this doleful weight.
I will come with you.
I ask only one favor in return.
translation.es: Solo te pediré un favor a cambio.

translation.en: Square my account with that terrible hag...
translation.es: Salda mi deuda con esa arpía maldita.

translation.en: over there. Would you?
We welcome those newly arrived here.
translation.es: Les damos la bienvenida a los nuevos.

translation.en: Turn us now in common poise, with one mind, sharpened.
translation.es: Convirtámonos en un grupo presto, con una única mente aguda.

translation.en: Together...
we will bring France down.
Together...
we will bring her to her knees.
Captains all, to this end,
I wish to introduce to you a new marshal of our campaign.
translation.es: les presentaré a un nuevo capitán de nuestra campaña.

translation.en: Sir John's experience in battle should need no recitation. You know of him.
translation.es: No hace falta mencionar la experiencia en combate de sir John. La conocen.

translation.en: Some of you have had the honor of fighting alongside him.
translation.es: Algunos han tenido el honor de pelear a su lado.

translation.en: Others have heard tale of his exploits.
translation.es: Otros han oído historias de sus hazañas.

translation.en: But I have tasked Sir John to join this campaign for one most vital reason alone:
translation.es: Pero le he encargado a sir John la tarea de unírsenos por un motivo vital:

translation.en: he respects war as only a man who has seen its most monstrous form can.
translation.es: respeta la guerra como solo puede hacerlo un hombre que ha visto lo peor.

translation.en: He lusts after it not,
but rather regards it with the grim sobriety that you and your men should hope he would.
translation.es: sino que la ve con la total solemnidad, como ustedes deberían esperar.

translation.en: Welcome,
and thank you...
good sirs.
You're all well met.
Very good.
Are you ready for what awaits us?
translation.es: ¿Estás listo para lo que nos espera?

translation.en: One is never ready for what awaits us.
translation.es: Uno nunca está listo para lo que le espera.

translation.en: Get!
You believe Sir John there to be fit and suitable enough to captain this effort?
translation.es: ¿Crees que sir John sea un capitán apto para la tarea?

translation.en: John is a good man.
They meet us at sea or upon landing.
translation.es: Nos encontrarán en el mar o cuando desembarquemos.

translation.en: We shall know soon enough.
You must rest.
Thank you.
What for?
For being here.
With me.
Well, it's a small price to pay to keep that detestable Hooper woman off me back.
translation.es: Es un pequeño precio a pagar por haberme quitado de encima a Hooper.

translation.en: Get some rest too, my liege.
We land quickly!
Check every building.
No man!
- No man here! - Clear!
- No man here. - No man.
Go on. Faster.
Light.
Pull!
Pull!
We must storm that castle.
It will be bloody. We will most surely sacrifice souls.
translation.es: Será muy sangriento. Sin duda perderemos a muchos.

translation.en: Thus is the nature of war. It is bloody and soulless.
translation.es: Así es la guerra. Sangrienta y desalmada.

translation.en: - - We have no way of knowing how well supplied they are behind those walls.
translation.es: No sabemos qué tantos suministros tienen dentro.

translation.en: This siege may take months, and months, I fear, we have not at our disposal.
translation.es: Este asedio podría durar meses, y me temo que no tenemos ese tiempo.

translation.en: Men in these numbers, fixed here,
will fall to hunger and disease.
War is...
bloody and soulless.
The archbishop has arrived.
Surely you cannot simply idle here until they decide to come out?
translation.es: Imagino que no esperarán aquí hasta que decidan salir.

translation.en: That is precisely the definition of a siege.
translation.es: Esa es la definición de asedio.

translation.en: How long might that take? Surely there's no way of knowing.
translation.es: ¿Cuánto podría demorar? Creo que no hay manera de saberlo.

translation.en: Uh, that too, is a common characteristic of a siege.
translation.es: Eso también es un aspecto característico de un asedio.

translation.en: - I will not send my men up that hill. - But why in heavens not?
translation.es: - No enviaré hombres ahí. - ¿Por qué no?

translation.en: I will not sacrifice my men so flagrantly, nor so speculatively.
translation.es: No sacrificaré hombres tan descarada ni especulativamente.

translation.en: Well, then why do you not simply go around?
If they insist on hiding in their castle, why do you not simply go around it?
translation.es: Si insisten en esconderse en el castillo, ¿por qué no lo rodean?

translation.en: So well versed in the art of warfare.
translation.es: Qué versado en el arte de la guerra.

translation.en: We must take this town, Archbishop.
We must establish a garrison foothold here...
for our lines of supply from England.
translation.es: ...para las líneas de suministro de Inglaterra.

translation.en: Do not forget that I have underwritten this campaign.
translation.es: No olviden que conseguí financiamiento para esta campaña.

translation.en: I have interest here.
And I will be heard.
Not today, Archbishop.
My liege.
They have surrendered.
- Our debate now, it seems, is for nothing. - Hmm.
translation.es: Creo que el debate fue en vano.

translation.en: As are the archbishop's bleatings.
translation.es: Así como las quejas del arzobispo.

translation.en: The day is yours.
We ask only that our women and children be freed.
translation.es: Solo pedimos que liberen a las mujeres y a los niños.

translation.en: Many are hungry and wounded and becoming sick.
Upon full account of the castle, I see no reason to deny your request.
translation.es: Cuando hayamos terminado con el castillo, no veo motivo para negarlo.

translation.en: You will have tonight to oversee this evacuation
and to corral your men prisoners.
Come.
He wishes to slow us.
Who wishes to slow us?
We have received word that the Dauphin is en route.
translation.es: Nos han dicho que el delfín está en camino.

translation.en: He wishes conference with His Majesty.
And we know nothing of his purpose?
We know only that he desires conference.
I would hope his purpose be to deliver his father's early surrender.
translation.es: Desearía que quisiera ofrecer la rendición de su padre.

translation.en: I strongly advise we disregard this word of his approach and ready our movement.
translation.es: Sugiero que ignoremos su pedido y nos preparemos para avanzar.

translation.en: We must make advantage of their disarray.
Sir John, your counsel.
I've never met the man... this French prince.
translation.es: Jamás vi a este príncipe francés.

translation.en: I can't speak to his motivation.
My liege.
He's here.
Your Majesty.
To... your little... victory.
Do you wonder why I have come?
Do you wonder this?
I have not come to offer you surrender
translation.es: No he venido a ofrecer la rendición,

translation.en: if that is what you are hoping.
translation.es: si eso es lo que espera.

translation.en: I have come to describe for you
your end days,
the screams of your men  as they die slow.
translation.es: ...los gritos de sus hombres mientras mueren lentamente.

translation.en: And so, King of, uh, England,
you seem so intent on making France your new home,
translation.es: ...se lo ve muy decidido a hacer de Francia su nuevo hogar,

translation.en: so let me help you.
I will drain your body of its blood
translation.es: Le vaciaré el cuerpo de sangre...

translation.en: and bury it under a tree.
A little French tree.
Very young, very small.
Since perchance that is fitting of your mind for you to come here.
translation.es: Si por casualidad eso le parece oportuno al venir aquí.

translation.en: Small.
And maybe your...
I mean, no, your balls must be big, no?
Giant balls.
Giant balls...
with a tiny cock.
And the sound of your wives and children weeping
translation.es: El sonido del llanto de sus esposas e hijos...

translation.en: shall lull me to sleep at night.
Have you heard what I said?
I have.
It was stirring.
Sir John, please walk with me.
Good night.
Ready the men to move.
Waste no time.
Run!
Hush, hush, hush. Hush. Hush.
Hello, little boy.
Don't be afraid. Don't be afraid.
I want you to deliver a gift to your king.
translation.es: Quiero que le lleves un obsequio a tu rey.

translation.en: Will you do this for me?
Good boy.
Double the guards to 20 yards through the night.
translation.es: Dupliquen la guardia a 20 metros toda la noche.

translation.en: Three hours at a watch.
I want these men fresh and alert. Any man caught sleeping will have his eyes gouged.
translation.es: Los quiero alertas. Si pescan a uno durmiendo, le arrancarán los ojos.

translation.en: Any caught speaking will lose his tongue.
translation.es: Si pescan a uno hablando, le cortarán la lengua.

translation.en: And I want all French prisoners in our train put to death.
translation.es: Y quiero que asesinen a todos los prisioneros franceses.

translation.en: Leave their corpses speared on pikes by the river's edge.
translation.es: Cuelguen los cuerpos en picas a lo largo del río.

translation.en: The first command I'll heed.
The second...
you'll have to carry out that mass execution yourself.
translation.es: Tendrás que encargarte tú de la ejecución en masa.

translation.en: What did you say to me?
You are not that man.
translation.es: No eres esa clase de hombre.

translation.en: How dare you defy me?
Show your feeling in here, with me. - Don't let it outside this tent. - How dare you defy me? I am the king.
translation.es: - Que no salga de aquí. - ¿Cómo te atreves? Soy el rey.

translation.en: And where is the fearsome old warrior Falstaff about whom I've heard so much?
translation.es: ¿Dónde está el imponente guerrero Falstaff del que tanto han hablado?

translation.en: You've been mute since we crossed the sea.
translation.es: Estás mudo desde que cruzamos el mar.

translation.en: I seem to be serving as my own chief tactician, my own commander, my own counsel.
translation.es: Siento que soy mi propio jefe táctico, mi propio comandante y asesor.

translation.en: Where is the fearsome old warrior Falstaff?!
translation.es: ¿Dónde está el viejo e imponente guerrero Falstaff?

translation.en: I speak only when there's something to be said.
translation.es: Solo hablo cuando hay algo que decir.

translation.en: Too often have I seen men of war invent work for themselves,
translation.es: He visto demasiadas veces a soldados que se inventan tareas...

translation.en: work that leads to nothing but vainglory and slaughtered men.
translation.es: ...tareas con las que solo consiguen gloria banal y muerte.

translation.en: I'm not that man.
And this here is the war that you have chosen to wage.
translation.es: Y esta es la guerra que tú has elegido.

translation.en: I will disembowel you right here with mine own hand.
translation.es: Te destriparé aquí mismo con mis propias manos.

translation.en: You are not that man, either.
translation.es: Tú tampoco eres esa clase de hombre.

translation.en: Evening, M'Lord.
- Gentlemen. - M'Lord.
Lord Dorset, summon your fastest rider.
translation.es: Lord Dorset, busca a tu jinete más veloz.

translation.en: My liege.
Dartmouth!
Sires. What can I do for you?
Tell me what lies over that hill. Ride fast, return directly.
translation.es: Dime qué hay en esa colina. Cabalga rápido y regresa enseguida.

translation.en: We are both outnumbered and out- positioned.
translation.es: Nos superan en número y en posición.

translation.en: They have the downslope in their favor.
translation.es: Tienen la ladera a su favor.

translation.en: Our need to advance puts us already at disadvantage.
translation.es: Nuestra necesidad de avanzar nos pone en desventaja.

translation.en: The longer we wait, the larger their force will grow,
translation.es: Mientras más esperemos, más fuerza tendrán,

translation.en: and with it, our disadvantage.
Your archers, my lord, are of superior faculty.
French crossbow is no match for an English longbow.
translation.es: Un arco francés no es rival para un arco largo inglés.

translation.en: We should hobble their number on first assault by these means alone.
translation.es: Reduciremos su número en un primer ataque solo con arcos.

translation.en: York's charge in center faces four lines of mounted knights.
translation.es: La carga de York se enfrenta a cuatro líneas de caballeros.

translation.en: Our archers here might weaken those by half. But--
translation.es: Nuestros arqueros podrían con la mitad...

translation.en: But not eight lines.
Nine. Ten. More.
You speak true, my liege. The longer we wait, the greater our disadvantage.
translation.es: Es cierto, señor. Más esperamos, mayor la desventaja.

translation.en: But it is possible our disadvantage has already grown insurmountable.
translation.es: Pero es posible que nuestra desventaja ya sea insalvable.

translation.en: A great many men are already desperately ill and weak from hunger.
translation.es: Muchos hombres ya están muy enfermos y débiles por el hambre.

translation.en: What then, my lord, do you propose we do?
I propose we consider turning back, my liege.
I know it will not bring the outcome we desire,
translation.es: Sé que no nos dará el resultado que queremos,

translation.en: but nor will the evisceration of our army.
translation.es: pero tampoco lo hará un ejército destripado.

translation.en: I'm reticent to speak for others here now,
translation.es: No me atrevo a hablar por los demás...

translation.en: but I'm certain my fears are shared.
Who here agrees with Lord Dorset?
translation.es: ¿Quién está de acuerdo con lord Dorset?

translation.en: You can win this battle.
Is that so, Sir John?
Yes.
And precisely how is that so, Sir John?
You fight without horses and without armor.
translation.es: Pelearemos sin caballos y sin armaduras.

translation.en: Heavens above, please spare us from this man.
translation.es: Santo cielo, libéranos de este hombre.

translation.en: Their forward defense is a front line of mounted men.
translation.es: Su defensa delantera es una línea de hombres a caballo.

translation.en: Many deep.
Knights all.
All on horseback, all with heavy armor.
translation.es: Todos a caballo, con armaduras pesadas.

translation.en: The ground out there...
is a flood bowl,
already half- sodden.
When it rains tonight, as I know it will,
translation.es: Cuando llueva esta noche, y sé que así será...

translation.en: that ground will turn into a muddy bog.
translation.es: ...el terreno se convertirá en un lodazal.

translation.en: And with their horses and their armor,
translation.es: Y con sus caballos y sus armaduras...

translation.en: they will get stuck, they will fall,
and they will flounder like upturned beetles.
As shall we.
Not if we travel light,
without horses and without armor.
Speed and mobility will be our advantage.
translation.es: La velocidad y la agilidad serán nuestra ventaja.

translation.en: And how, Sir John, can you be so sure of rainfall tonight?
translation.es: Sir John, ¿cómo puedes estar seguro de que lloverá?

translation.en: My right knee is aching. It only does that when rain is near.
translation.es: Me duele la rodilla derecha. Solo me duele cuando está por llover.

translation.en: Oh, save us, my liege. Please put a stop to this drivel.
translation.es: Señor, por favor, detenga esta barbaridad.

translation.en: This would require their armored front line come meet us in the mud.
translation.es: Hará falta que su línea armada nos ataque en el lodazal.

translation.en: How do you propose we invite that?
A small forward armored attack of our own.
A false advance.
They will counter.
We save our weight and our muscle for a nimble assault from the flanks.
translation.es: Guardamos el peso y la fuerza para un ataque veloz desde los flancos.

translation.en: They shan't be so easily deceived. They will not respond to false attack.
translation.es: No los engañaremos tan fácilmente. No responderán a un falso ataque.

translation.en: They will respond.
We move, they will meet us in the mud.
Our men- at- arms are outnumbered. This they know.
translation.es: Ellos saben que nos superan en hombres.

translation.en: They will hope to overwhelm us, so they will meet us with full force,
translation.es: Querrán arrollarnos, así que atacarán con fuerza,

translation.en: no matter how small our first advance.
translation.es: sin importar lo poco que avancemos.

translation.en: Our great longbows will rain chaos on them from above.
translation.es: Nuestros arcos largos crearán caos desde arriba.

translation.en: That chaos will be your favor.
My liege, I implore you, we mustn't... we mustn't listen to this madness.
translation.es: Señor, le imploro, no escuche esta locura.

translation.en: What is the true experience of this man? He once fought for Richard many years ago.
translation.es: ¿Qué experiencia tiene este hombre? Peleó una vez para Ricardo, hace años.

translation.en: Since then, he has done nothing...
translation.es: Desde entonces, no ha hecho nada...

translation.en: other than ride with the companies,
robbing and tormenting.
I never robbed anyone who didn't deserve to be robbed.
translation.es: Jamás le robé a nadie que no se lo mereciera.

translation.en: If it rains tonight,
we fight tomorrow.
If you have concocted this plan, half- baked and speculative,
translation.es: Si has ideado este plan de manera especulativa...

translation.en: merely to prove to me your worth,
please say so now.
All plans are speculative.
And as I say, I only speak them when I feel them true.
translation.es: Y solo los comento cuando creo que pueden funcionar.

translation.en: This one I feel in my bones.
This one I feel in my knee bone.
translation.es: Que me duela la rodilla es una señal.

translation.en: Here we are on the eve of this fight, and I am...
translation.es: Estamos en la víspera de la pelea...

translation.en: I am scared to wonder, to tell it true,
translation.es: ...y para ser sincero tengo miedo de pensar...

translation.en: why we are here.
You best discover the answer for that.
translation.es: Más te vale descubrir la respuesta.

translation.en: The men out there deserve it.
They've given their lives to you.
I cannot say what forces have conspired to bring you here,
translation.es: No sé qué fuerzas han conspirado para traerte aquí,

translation.en: but these men need you,
just as you need them.
These men deserve your confidence.
And if you cannot give them that,
translation.es: Y si no puedes darles eso,

translation.en: at least then tell them a magnificent lie.
translation.es: al menos diles una magnífica mentira.

translation.en: Though you might not think it possible...
you are my friend.
Good night, Hal.
Sleep well.
This wind whips from the north.
The rain was sent from England.
Why are you being fitted with plate? We were to fight without armor.
translation.es: ¿Qué haces? Íbamos a luchar sin armadura.

translation.en: We need a front line to draw them in.
translation.es: Necesitamos una línea frontal que los atraiga.

translation.en: It cannot be you.
The idea was mine.
Some man must lead the first push to sell it well.
translation.es: Alguien debe ejecutar el avance para que sea creíble.

translation.en: My men have been assembled.
And I cannot, in good conscience,
send them out there to realize my speculative drivel without getting muddy alongside them, can I?
translation.es: a que cumplan con mi plan especulativo sin ensuciarme junto a ellos, ¿no?

translation.en: I will fight with you.
It's noble, but you know that cannot be.
translation.es: Es noble. Pero sabes que no puedes.

translation.en: This is what I was built for.
I die here or... I die over a bottle in Eastcheap.
translation.es: Muero aquí o muero ebrio en Eastcheap.

translation.en: And I think this makes for a much better story.
translation.es: Y creo que aquí la anécdota será mejor.

translation.en: And you have things still to do.
translation.es: Y tú todavía tienes cosas que hacer.

translation.en: You will join this fight.
But promise me you don't join too early.
translation.es: Pero prométeme que no te unirás demasiado pronto.

translation.en: It doesn't matter what you see out there.
We must first draw them all in. All of them.
translation.es: Primero debemos atraerlos a todos. A todos.

translation.en: Promise me that, Hal.
Win, my friend.
Maybe then you'll lighten enough to have a drink with me. Hmm?
translation.es: Quizás después estés alegre y quieras beber conmigo.

translation.en: Where is the Dauphin?
I humbly thank you for receiving me, noble lord.
translation.es: Le agradezco humildemente que me reciba, noble señor.

translation.en: Please.
Please speak English.
I enjoy to speak English.
It is simple... and ugly.
I have been waiting all morning,
all the night...
for your surrender.
It might have saved a great unease
had it come sooner.
I know you do not speak for your father. I do speak for my father.
translation.es: - Sé que no habla por su padre. - Sí hablo por él.

translation.en: I know you do not speak for your father, so I come to you now directly.
translation.es: Sé que no habla por su padre, por eso vengo a hablar con usted.

translation.en: I have not come to surrender.
Too much Christian blood will be spilled on this field today.
translation.es: Se derramará mucha sangre cristiana en este campo hoy.

translation.en: So, I propose this:
You and I fight, one man on one man.
translation.es: Lucharemos usted y yo, hombre a hombre.

translation.en: We fight in our armies' stead.
translation.es: Lucharemos en lugar de nuestros ejércitos.

translation.en: If I lose, my men will leave this place forthwith and forever.
translation.es: Si pierdo, mis hombres abandonarán este lugar de inmediato y por siempre.

translation.en: You will have my head.
If I win, I will assume this kingdom's crown upon your father's death.
translation.es: Si yo gano, asumiré como rey cuando su padre muera.

translation.en: What say you?
Are you scared, young Henry?
What say you?
Are you scared of this battle?
There is no shame of it.
Save your men.
You save your own men.
You came here. To me!
Surrender to me!
I cannot do that.
Well, then, boy,
let us make famous... that field out there.
This little village of Agincourt,
that will forever mark the site of your callow disgrace.
translation.es: ...marcará eternamente el lugar de su inexperta deshonra.

translation.en: You expect of me a speech?
I have only one to give, and it is the same one I'd give
translation.es: Solo tengo uno para darles, y es el mismo que les daría

translation.en: were we not standing on the brim of a battlefield.
translation.es: si no estuviéramos por ir a la batalla.

translation.en: It is the same one I'd give were we to meet in the street by chance.
translation.es: Es el mismo que les daría si nos viéramos de casualidad en la calle.

translation.en: I have only ever hoped for one thing...
to see this kingdom united under this English crown.
translation.es: ...ver este reino unido bajo la corona inglesa.

translation.en: All men are born to die. We know it. We carry it with us always.
translation.es: Todo hombre nace para morir. Lo sabemos. Nos acompaña siempre.

translation.en: If your day be today, so be it.
translation.es: Si su día es hoy, que así sea.

translation.en: Mine will be tomorrow.
Or mine today and yours tomorrow. It matters not.
translation.es: O el mío será hoy, y el de ustedes será mañana. No importa.

translation.en: What matters is that you know, in your hearts,
translation.es: Lo que importa es que ustedes saben

translation.en: that today you are that kingdom united.
translation.es: que hoy son el reino unido.

translation.en: You are England. Each and every one of you. England is you.
translation.es: Ustedes son Inglaterra. Cada uno. Inglaterra son ustedes.

translation.en: And it is the space between you.
translation.es: Y es el espacio entre ustedes.

translation.en: Fight not for yourselves, fight for that space.
translation.es: No peleen por ustedes, peleen por ese espacio.

translation.en: Fill that space. Make it tissue. Make it mass.
translation.es: Llenen ese espacio. Háganlo tejido, masa.

translation.en: Make it impenetrable. Make it yours!
Make it England!
Make it England!
Great men to it. Captains, lords.
Great men to it!
For the King and St. George!
Archers.
Archers!
Archers!
Archers! Now!
Draw!
Loose!
Halt!
Ready!
Loose!
On me!
Come then...
King of England.
Hail the King.
Hail the King.
Hail the King.
- God save the King. - Hail the King.
Hail the King.
- Hail the King. - Hail King Henry.
translation.es: - Viva el rey. - Viva el rey Enrique.

translation.en: Hail the King.
My liege.
The prisoners we have took are a rabble.
I fear we will not secure them should their army regroup.
translation.es: No podremos controlarlos si su ejército se reagrupa.

translation.en: Kill them all.
Your Majesty...
Henry, King of England.
Your Majesty...
Come sit here with me.
Please.
I like to have the sun on my skin, but not too much.
translation.es: Me gusta que me dé el sol, pero no demasiado.

translation.en: Too much is very dangerous.
This conversation we are about to have...
translation.es: La conversación que vamos a tener...

translation.en: has been had many times before,
and will be had many times again for centuries to come
translation.es: y existirá muchas veces más en los próximos siglos,

translation.en: between men of vanity and men of good reason.
translation.es: entre hombres orgullosos y hombres racionales.

translation.en: I would hope that you and I are men of good reason.
translation.es: Espero que usted y yo seamos hombres racionales.

translation.en: I have, of course, traveled here to offer you my surrender.
translation.es: Por supuesto, he venido aquí a ofrecer mi rendición.

translation.en: Do you ask anything of me in return?
I do, however, have for you a proposition.
translation.es: Pero sí quiero hacerle una propuesta.

translation.en: You take the hand of my daughter, Catherine,
translation.es: Acepte la mano de mi hija, Catalina...

translation.en: in marriage.
It is most uncanny...
that the great movements of history
translation.es: ...pero los grandes actos de la historia

translation.en: so frequently find their origins in the minutia of family.
translation.es: frecuentemente se gestan en las nimiedades de la familia.

translation.en: That in ways I dare not unsettle here,
translation.es: Por motivos que no quiero mencionar...

translation.en: my relationship with my son
and yours... with your father.
translation.es: y su relación con su padre...

translation.en: These are the things that have led us here today.
translation.es: ...es lo que nos ha traído aquí.

translation.en: We are leaders of lands and peoples,
translation.es: Somos líderes de tierras y pueblos.

translation.en: and yet... it is family that moves us.
translation.es: Sin embargo, es la familia lo que nos motiva.

translation.en: Family...
consumes us.
My condolences to you...
for the loss of your friend, Sir John.
translation.es: ...por la muerte de tu amigo, sir John.

translation.en: I know you must feel this loss deeply.
translation.es: Sé que te apena mucho su muerte.

translation.en: Thank you, William.
Your loyalty to me has been comforting.
You have proven yourself to be a most worthy king.
translation.es: Has demostrado ser un rey digno.

translation.en: I would say you have proven yourself
to be one of England's great kings.
translation.es: uno de los mejores reyes de Inglaterra.

translation.en: Your Majesty, the crowd has gathered.
translation.es: Su majestad... ...se ha reunido una multitud.

translation.en: So I hear.
Leave us.
Please sit, Your Majesty.
You are beautiful.
I will no longer speak French. We must speak English.
translation.es: No hablaré más en francés. Debemos hablar en inglés.

translation.en: I cannot speak English.
You will learn.
I wonder, then, how our union might proceed in the meantime.
translation.es: Dudo cómo será nuestra relación mientras tanto.

translation.en: There is much I wonder about a great many things.
translation.es: Yo tengo muchas dudas de muchas cosas.

translation.en: Indeed there must be for you to contemplate marriage to a woman about whom...
translation.es: Imagino que sí, ya que considera casarse con una mujer

translation.en: you know so little.
I will not submit to you.
translation.es: Yo no me someteré a usted.

translation.en: You must earn my respect.
I understand that.
Do you?
I do.
Do you feel a sense of achievement?
In what regard?
In any regard.
I have achieved that which my father never could.
translation.es: He logrado lo que mi padre jamás logró.

translation.en: I have united this kingdom in common cause.
You have achieved momentary respite.
A unity forged under false pretense will never be a unity that prevails.
translation.es: La unidad lograda con engaños nunca prevalecerá.

translation.en: How, pray, have my endeavors been forged falsely?
translation.es: ¿Dices que mis esfuerzos fueron un engaño?

translation.en: Why did you bring war to France?  Your father came on spoiling.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué trajo la guerra a Francia? - Tu padre fue el instigador.

translation.en: How so? How was he spoiling?
translation.es: ¿Por qué dice que fue el instigador?

translation.en: He sent an assassin.
There was no assassin.
There was no plot to kill you.
How might you know?
Because I was with my father when he received word of your charge.
translation.es: Estaba con mi padre cuando le avisaron de su ataque.

translation.en: I know him well enough to know his reaction to be genuine.
translation.es: Lo conozco y sé que su reacción fue genuina.

translation.en: How was his reaction?
He laughed.
He laughed very much. He said you must be drunk.
translation.es: Rio con fuerzas. Dijo que usted debía estar ebrio.

translation.en: Your father is a madman.
He may be mad, but he is true.
His madness makes him true. He says only what he believes.
translation.es: Su locura lo hace sincero. Dice solo lo que cree.

translation.en: That is why he is loved.
The assassin then was sent by your brother.
translation.es: Entonces, el asesino lo envió tu hermano.

translation.en: - My brother? - Mm- hmm. My brother was too stupid to conjure such a plan.
translation.es: Mi hermano es demasiado estúpido para semejante plan.

translation.en: What was your true reason? Did you know of the ball he sent?
translation.es: - ¿Cuál fue su verdadero motivo? - ¿Sabes que me envió una pelota?

translation.en: The ball he sent to me?
A ball?
He sent to you...
- a ball? - Why should you question my intent?
translation.es: ¿Le envió una pelota? ¿Por qué cuestionas mis motivos?

translation.en: Your father's rule is illegitimate. He has no right claim to his throne.
translation.es: El reinado de tu padre es ilegítimo. No puede reclamar el trono.

translation.en: All monarchy is illegitimate.
You yourself are the son of a usurper.
translation.es: Usted es el hijo de un usurpador.

translation.en: It would seem that you have no explanation for what you have done.
translation.es: Parece que no puede justificar lo que ha hecho.

translation.en: You have shed the blood of so many Christian souls, and yet...
translation.es: Ha derramado la sangre de muchos cristianos...

translation.en: before me now, all I see is a...
young and vain and foolish man so easily riled.
translation.es: tengo a un joven orgulloso, tonto y fácil de irritar.

translation.en: So easily beguiled.
I must leave you now.
Gentle.
We must be sure to revel in this day, my friend.
A crowd has gathered in honor of our victory.
translation.es: Se ha reunido una multitud en honor a nuestra victoria.

translation.en: These are the rare moments for which a king truly lives, I would imagine.
translation.es: Imagino que estos son los raros momentos por los que vive un rey.

translation.en: In all my preoccupation, I have... neglected to ask after your family.
translation.es: Estuve muy preocupado y olvidé preguntar por tu familia.

translation.en: Your preoccupations are hardly trifling.
You have two sons.
I do.
And...
your wife minds your estate in your absence.
translation.es: ...tu esposa se ocupa de la casa en tu ausencia.

translation.en: She does.
Yours is sheep.
You're a man of wool.
As was my father before me.
How many head?
At last count, some 4,000. Mostly Dorset Horns.
translation.es: Según el último recuento, 4000. Más que nada de raza dorset horn.

translation.en: How much land have you?
To be true, I'm not...
wholly certain, but...
but many... many hundreds of beautiful, beautiful acres.
translation.es: Pero tengo varios cientos de hermosas hectáreas.

translation.en: What lands in France have you now annexed?
Stop.
Now that France is ours, how much of her land is now yours?
translation.es: Ahora que Francia es nuestra, ¿con cuánta tierra te has quedado?

translation.en: Oh, well...
That has yet to be determined.
translation.es: Eso todavía no se ha definido.

translation.en: Your conquest is so recent.
- Why do you ask this question-- - Stay up there.
- Hmm? - Stay up there.
How did my assassin come to you?
I fail to remember the moment.
Remedy this failure.
So much has happened in the intervening months.
translation.es: Han ocurrido muchas cosas en estos meses.

translation.en: An event as pivotal as this one
should be amply equipped to penetrate the fog of time elapsed.
translation.es: hallará la manera de penetrar la niebla del tiempo transcurrido.

translation.en: Of course.
Let me recall.
Was it in the street?
Did he come to you in the street?
Yes. Yes, it was in the street.
He approached me...
most unusually.
My liege, please, tell me the cause of this concern.
translation.es: Señor, dígame por qué la preocupación.

translation.en: Stay up there.
Stay up there.
Did he know your name?
I don't believe he did.
How, then, did he know who you were to approach?
translation.es: ¿Cómo sabía que debía hablarte a ti?

translation.en: The memory is returning.
He surrendered himself to palace guards
translation.es: Se entregó a los guardias del palacio,

translation.en: and the matter was brought to my attention. I was taken to him.
translation.es: me mencionaron el asunto y me llevaron con él.

translation.en: So, he did not come to you in the street. No. No, it was not in the street. Forgive me.
translation.es: - No te habló en la calle. - No fue en la calle. Perdón.

translation.en: I was summoned to his cell.
Has a problem arisen...
Hal?
Yes. A problem has arisen.
And it wobbles before me now on its silly little stool
translation.es: Y titubea frente a mí sobre un pequeño taburete

translation.en: - at mine own elevation. - I'm afraid I don't understand.
translation.es: a mi propia elevación. Temo que no entiendo.

translation.en: - Please, please, stop this charade. - Sincerely, I do not understand.
translation.es: - Termina esta farsa. - En serio, no comprendo.

translation.en: Stop the fucking charade! Stop it!
I have given you what you wanted, boy!
Have I not?!
You wanted peace.  Did you not?!
This is how peace is forged.
It is forged in victory.
Listen.
That is the sound of peace.
translation.es: Ese es el sonido de la paz.

translation.en: That is the sound of your peace.
translation.es: Ese es el sonido de tu paz.

translation.en: That is the sound of your greatness.
translation.es: Ese es el sonido de tu grandeza.

translation.en: I ask nothing of you...
only that you will always speak to me clear and true.
translation.es: ...solo que siempre me digas la verdad.

translation.en: Always.
Will you promise me only that?
- Long live the King! - I will.
King Henry!
King Henry!  King Henry!
